button.name: Pediatric Cancer Mutation
button.intro: The Pediatric dataset consists of somatic variants and tumor RNA-seq data shown in the protein view. The dataset is comprised of the GRCh37/hg19 genome as well as data from the Pediatric Cancer Genome Project (PCGP), NCI Target cohort, the Pan-TARGET study (PMID: 29489755), and the Shanghai Children's Medical Center T-ALL cohort (PMID: 32632335). A liftover of genomic variants and gene internals created the GRCh/hg38 dataset.
